mapper.select: SELECT member_file_no, ref_mno, upload_date, file_level, origin_name, change_name FROM member_attachment WHERE ref_mno = #{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET nickname = #{nickname}, user_intro = #{userIntro}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address} WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_attachment ( member_file_no, ref_mno, upload_date, file_level, origin_name, change_name ) VALUES ( default, #{refMno}, now(), #{fileLevel}, #{originName}, #{changeName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member_attachment SET ref_mno = #{refMno}, upload_date = now(), file_level = #{fileLevel}, origin_name = #{originName}, change_name = #{changeName} WHERE ref_mno = #{refMno}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, EMAIL, USER_NAME, NICKNAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, ADDRESS, PHONE, LIKE_FISH, TAIL_FISH, AUTHORITY, ACTIVATED, USER_LV, JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_FILE_NO, USER_INTRO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND ACTIVATED = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET activated = 'N', drop_date = now() WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUY b JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION po USING (P_OPTION_NO) JOIN PRODUCT p USING (P_NO) WHERE po.PO_STATUS = 'Y' AND p.P_STATUS = 'Y' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND b.BUY_STATUS = false

SELECT P_NO, P_OPTION_NO, P_CHANGE_NAME, P_TITLE, P_OPTION_NAME, BUY_COUNT, P_PRICE FROM BUY b JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION po USING (P_OPTION_NO) JOIN PRODUCT p USING (P_NO) WHERE po.PO_STATUS = 'Y' AND p.P_STATUS = 'Y' AND b.USER_NO = #{userNo} AND b.BUY_STATUS = false
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BUY b WHERE b.user_no = #{userNo} AND b.buy_status = true

SELECT p_no, p_option_no, buy_date, p_change_name, p_title, p_option_name, buy_count, p_price, store_name FROM buy b JOIN product_option po USING (p_option_no) JOIN product p USING (p_no) JOIN product_category pc ON (pc.c_no = p.c_no) JOIN seller_page USING (seller_page_no) JOIN seller_info USING (business_no) WHERE b.user_no = #{userNo} AND b.buy_status = true
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE status = 'Y' AND user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT board_no, board_level, board_title, write_date, board_count FROM board WHERE status = 'Y' AND user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY write_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE status = 'Y' AND user_no = #{userNo} AND board_level IN (0, 1, 2, 3) GROUP BY board_level
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM inquiry WHERE status = 'Y' AND user_no = #{userNo}
SELECT inquiry_no, inquiry_title, inquiry_date, status FROM inquiry WHERE status = 'Y' AND user_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY inquiry_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller_info( business_no, user_no, business_name, sub_business_name, open_business_date, store_name, crn, main_business_name, main_item_name, business_address, business_account ) VALUES( #{businessNo}, #{userNo}, #{businessName}, #{subBusinessName}, #{openBusinessDate}, #{storeName}, #{crn}, #{mainBusinessName}, #{mainItemName}, #{businessAddress}, #{businessAccount} )
mapper.select: SELECT P_NO, P_TITLE, P_PRICE, P_CHANGE_NAME, LOVE_DATE, SELLER_PAGE_NO, STORE_NAME FROM PRODUCT JOIN PRODUCT_CATEGORY USING(C_NO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT SELLER_PAGE_NO, BUSINESS_NO, STORE_NAME FROM SELLER_PAGE JOIN SELLER_INFO USING(BUSINESS_NO)) PRODUCT_INFO USING (SELLER_PAGE_NO) JOIN LOVE_IT USING(P_NO) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY LOVE_DATE DESC
